item.title: Dangerous Parking, 30th September
item.description:
These cars ALWAYS park directly on the bend of the junction between Doran Grove and Landstead Rd. Drivers are unable to see oncoming traffic when entering or leaving Doran Grove. It is extremely dangerous, and I believe contravenes the Highway Code. This has been reported number of times but appears no action has been taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Landstead Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paint down external drain, 30th September
item.description:
From one of the flats on floors above 11 Atwood house which is ground floor, spilled paint down drain. Liquid such as rainwater, usual spills out before slowly seething down drain, in this case it appears to be white paint. I noticed it on Friday 26 September but had difficulty logging on to report sooner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowen Drive, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter from bin, 30th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nightingale Road, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bottles filled with urine being thrown in the park, 30th September
item.description:
It has been observed that one of the residents of 54 High Street is repeatedly throwing bottles containing urine and other litter out of the kitchen window (facing the park). This behaviour has occurred on at least five separate occasions and appears to take place on a weekly basis. The council contractor, cleaning the park, is also aware of this and could provide more information. Such conduct is not only unhygienic and highly disturbing but also constitutes antisocial behaviour that poses a serious concern for the community. This behaviour must be addressed as a matter of urgency, and the individual responsible should face appropriate consequences.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
